oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Slide Collection - Street Scene, Broad Street
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Anchored by the Silver Dollar Saloon at the east end and Tootsie's Orchid Lounge on the west, Lower Broad was sprinkled with pawn shops and furniture stores in the early 1970's. 35 mm
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Silver Dollar Saloon; Tootsie's Orchid Lounge
